item.title: Past 24 hours CEX Net Inflow of 14,900 Ethereum
item.description: On August 11th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of ETH on CEX was 14,900. The top three CEX inflows are as follows:· Coinbase Pro, with an inflow of 6,758.13 ETH;· OKX, with an inflow of 3,842.33 ETH;· Kraken, with an inflow of 3,683.93 ETH.In addition, Binance had an outflow of 23,100 ETH, ranking first on the outflow list.

item.title: Capital B increased its Bitcoin holdings by 126 coins, bringing the total holding to 2201 coins.
item.description: On August 11th, according to an official announcement, the French listed company Capital B (formerly known as The Blockchain Group) increased its holdings by 126 bitcoins, and its total holding reached 2201 coins.

item.title: Celestia Foundation has purchased approximately 43.45 million TIA tokens held by Polychain, with the unlocking process set to commence this Saturday.
item.description: On August 11th, the Celestia Foundation had previously announced on July 24th that it would allocate $62.5 million to purchase all the remaining TIA held by Polychain and transfer it to new investors.This batch of TIA amounts to approximately 43.45 million tokens and is currently valued at around $82.2 million. It will adopt a rolling unlock mechanism, with the first unlock set to begin on August 16th and complete on November 14th.

item.title: InfiniChain On-chain Message Hacker: Limited to returning the stolen funds by 8:00 PM on August 13th, you may keep the profits as a white hat bounty.
item.description: August 11th. According to etherscan information, Infini left a message on the blockchain to the hacker at 13:29 (Beijing time) today. It was stated that the exploited funds (approximately $49.5 million) will be returned to the address: 0x5497131cf22e39cf1508955ed0cb3c3c39a8dee4 by August 13, 2025, 20:00 (Beijing time). The hacker is permitted to retain all profits as a white-hat bounty. If the return is made on time, Infini will not take any further legal action.

item.title: The Smarter Web Company Completes ￡7.6 Million Equity Sale
item.description: On August 11th, the publicly listed company The Smarter Web Company in the UK completed a new placement of ordinary shares, with a value of approximately ￡7.6 million.The Smarter Web Company had previously acquired 50 bitcoins on August 8th, and its total holdings reached 2100 bitcoins.

item.title: FTX/Alameda redeemed approximately 190,000 SOL tokens 1 hour ago, either for creditor compensation.
item.description: On August 11th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), 1 hour ago, FTX/Alameda redeemed 190,832.4 SOL from the staking account. The value of these redeemed SOL is $35.52 million. Based on previous on-chain transactions, it is speculated that these funds will likely be transferred to Bitgo in the near future or used to compensate the creditors of the bankrupt FTX.

item.title: Meme Token CLIPPY Surpasses $21 Million Market Cap, Up 81% in 24 Hours
item.description: August 11th. According to GMGN data, the Solana-based Meme token CLIPPY (Clippy PFP Cult) has reached a market capitalization of over $21 million. It has witnessed a 24-hour price increase of 81% and a 24-hour trading volume of $21 million.CLIPPY (Clippy PFP Cult) features the image of the classic Microsoft Office assistant Clippy, symbolizing a silent protest against modern tech companies that harm user interests through aggressive advertising, data collection, and complex subscription models. It conveys a sense of nostalgia for a purer era of software.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Therefore, investing in them should be done with caution.

item.title: Binance Alpha will list XCX, with a points airdrop threshold of 200 points.
item.description: August 11th. Binance Alpha is set to launch Xeleb Protocol (XCX), and Alpha trading will commence on August 11th, 2025, at 16:00 (UTC+8). Users who possess at least 200 Alpha points will be eligible to receive an airdrop of 800 XCX tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. In the event that the reward pool is not fully distributed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour. It should be noted that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Alpha points. Users must confirm the receipt on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the claim.

item.title: Meme Token Tokabu Surpasses $60 Million Market Cap, 24-hour Gain of 71.32%
item.description: August 11th. According to GMGN data, the Solana-based Meme token Tokabu (The Spirit of Gambling) has a market capitalization exceeding $60 million. It has a 24-hour gain of 71.32% and a 24-hour trading volume of $11.9 million. Tokabu (The Spirit of Gambling) emphasizes the Meme token gambler spirit and caters to the high volatility and quick returns of the crypto market. BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins often lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility, so investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: Nvidia's Response to "AI Chip Import Tariffs": Complying with the rules set by the U.S. government to participate in the global market
item.description: August 11th: In reaction to the market rumor that "NVIDIA and AMD have reached an agreement to allocate 15% of their AI chip sales revenue in the Chinese market to the U.S. government," NVIDIA responded by indicating that it adheres to the rules established by the U.S. government in order to participate in the global market. The demand for accelerated computing is of a global nature, and NVIDIA will continue to serve as many customers as possible within the framework of these rules. Up to now, AMD has not provided a response. (Caixin)
